titles.title: I've Been Redeemed, By The Blood Of The Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've been redeemed, by the blood of the Lamb.
I've been redeemed, by the blood of the Lamb.
I've been redeemed, by the blood of the Lamb.
Filled with the Holy Ghost I am.
All my sins are washed away; I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And that's not all, there's more besides. (3x)
I've been to the river and I've been baptised.
All my sins are washed away; I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You can talk about me just as much as you please. (3x)
I'll talk about you down on my knees.
All my sins are washed away; I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's a little seed in you and me. (3x)
Growing up to incorruptibility.
All my sins are washed away; I've been redeemed.
